accessEndpoints.description: Set of interface VPC endpoint (interface endpoint) objects. Maximum of 4. See below.

appstreamAgentVersion.description: Version of the AppStream 2.0 agent to use for this image builder.

arn.description: ARN of the appstream image builder.

createdTime.description: Date and time, in UTC and extended RFC 3339 format, when the image builder was created.

displayName.description: Human-readable friendly name for the AppStream image builder.

domainJoinInfo.description: Configuration block for the name of the directory and organizational unit (OU) to use to join the image builder to a Microsoft Active Directory domain. See below.

enableDefaultInternetAccess.description: Enables or disables default internet access for the image builder.

iamRoleArn.description: ARN of the IAM role to apply to the image builder.

imageArn.description: ARN of the public, private, or shared image to use.

imageName.description: Name of the image used to create the image builder.

instanceType.description: Instance type to use when launching the image builder.

name.description:
Unique name for the image builder.

The following arguments are optional:

state.description: State of the image builder. Can be: `PENDING`, `UPDATING_AGENT`, `RUNNING`, `STOPPING`, `STOPPED`, `REBOOTING`, `SNAPSHOTTING`, `DELETING`, `FAILED`, `UPDATING`, `PENDING_QUALIFICATION`

tags.description: Map of tags to assign to the instance. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: Map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

vpcConfig.description: Configuration block for the VPC configuration for the image builder. See below.
